title: Polymers - Repol [PP] | Relene [PE] | Reon (PVC) | Relpipe | RelWood™ | RELINFORCE™ | Petrochemical companies In India
description: Reliance polymers range of products include Repol [PP], Relene [PE], Reon (PVC), Relpipe among other. We offer a wide range of grades across sectors, packaging, agriculture, automotive, housing, healthcare, water and gas transportation, and consumer durables.
